name: Lastwall Sentry Dedication
prereq: Member Of The Knights Of Lastwall; Shield Block
summary: Swear yourself as a sentry for the Knights of Lastwall.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Lastwall sentry archetype.Lastwall Sentry Dedication Leads To...
